meanings.definition: The quality or state of being superhuman.
meanings.sent1: Her superhumanity amazed everyone at the talent show.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's superhumanity allowed him to save the city from disaster.
meanings.sent3: The robot's superhumanity in cleaning the house made the family laugh.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work reached a level of superhumanity.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's superhumanity on the field inspired the younger players.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of possessing superhuman abilities or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The villain's superhumanity made him a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent2: The comic book hero's superhumanity made him a fan favorite.
meanings.sent3: The cat's superhumanity in catching mice surprised the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence reached a level of superhumanity in solving complex puzzles.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's superhumanity in inventing new technologies changed the world.
